## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.collapseAll() method

Collapses all accordion items.

Calls `toggleAll` with `false` to close all items. Does nothing if the accordion type is "Single".


**Signature:**

```typescript
collapseAll(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

{<!-- -->void<!-- -->}
